sentences.sContent: To influence or lead by means of wiles; entice.
sentences.sContent_eng: To influence or lead by means of wiles; entice.
sentences.sCn: 引诱，诱骗通过使用诡计来影响或怂恿；诱使。

words.tran: 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力

trans.tranOther: to persuade someone to do something or go somewhere, usually by offering them something that they want
